quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the Union Minister of State for Health and Family Welfare has informed about the Central Mental Health Authority (CMHA). CMHA was constituted in which of the following years?
options: 2008
2018
2012
2016
2020

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to WHO Global Centre for Traditional Medicine (GCTM)?

A.     It will be jointly established by Ministry of AYUSH and WHO in Jamnagar, Gujarat.

B.      India has committed an estimated USD 50 million for the center.

C.      An interim office will be setup at the Institute Teaching and Research in Ayurveda (ITRA).
options: A and B
B and C
A and C
A only
A, B and C

quiz.text: Which of the following is not one of the six functional areas for which Ayush Grid platform envisages digitization of services?
options: Education
Research
Delivery of Medicines
Drug Administration
Medicinal Plants

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to the Ayush Grid Project?

A.     Ayush Grid Architecture has been designed as a four-layer model.

B.      Citizen Access Layer is part of the 4-layer model under the project.

C.      Ayush Grid follows relevant design principles of India Enterprise Architecture (IndEA) 2.0.
options: A and B
C only
A only
A and C
A, B and C

quiz.text:
Recently (Dec 2022), the Minister of State for Environment, Forest & Climate Change has provided details about the Geographic Information System (GIS) applications developed by the Ministry of Environment, Forest & Climate Change (MoEFCC). Which of the following applications is/are correctly matched with their features/objectives?

A.     e-Green Watch Portal     - facilitates single registration for all types of clearances

B.      PARIVESH Portal     - to facilitate automation, streamlining and effective management of plantation processes & other forestry works

C.      Van Agni Geo-Portal         - single point of source for the information related to forest fires in India
options: A and C
C only
A and B
B and C
A, B and C

quiz.text: Which of the following has been the theme of the recently (Dec 2022) held National Maternal Health Workshop in New Delhi?
options: Using technology for multilingual learning: Challenges and opportunities
Striving for zero preventable maternal mortality
Digitization of Service Delivery
Towards Comprehensive Maternal health
None of the above

quiz.text: During the workshop several states were awarded for their remarkable efforts and achievements in the area of maternal health. Which of the following has been recognized as the best performing state under the category ‘High-risk pregnancy management under Pradhan Mantri Surakshit Matritva Abhiyan (PMSMA)’?
options: Manipur
Tamil Nadu
Kerala
Karnataka
Madhya Pradesh

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the Minister of State for Petroleum and Natural Gas has shared the initiatives to promote the production of bio-fuels. Department of Bio-Technology has established ___________ Centres of Excellence in Bioenergy Capacity building to promote research and production of 2nd Generation biofuels.
options: 9
5
7
21
15

quiz.text: As per amendments in Indian Forest Act, 1927, __________ grown in non- forest areas is exempted from the definition of tree.
options: Neem
Deodar
Mango
Sal
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the Minister of State for Environment, Forest & Climate Change has listed out the key features of E-Waste Management Rules, 2022. Which of the following annual E-waste recycling targets is/are correctly mentioned with regards to their target year?
options: 50% for the year 2023-24 and 2024-25
60% for the year 2025-26 and 2026-27
70% for the year 2027-28 and 2028-29 and onwards
All of the above
None of the above

quiz.text: According to E-Waste (Management) Rules, 2022, Schedule I has been expanded and now __________ Electrical and Electronic Equipment (EEE) has been included under Extended Producer Responsibility (EPR) regime.
options: 87
145
106
124
71

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the Minister of State for Environment, Forest & Climate Change has listed out the year-wise target for minimum level of recycling of plastic waste across different categories of plastic packaging. What is the minimum EPR target for plastic packaging made from compostable plastic for the year 2025-26?
options: 30% to 50%
40% to 60%
50% to 70%
60% to 80%
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the Minister of State for Environment, Forest & Climate Change has briefed about the initiatives to cope with increase in sea level. Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to Baseline ALTM elevation data?
options: ALTM stands for Airborne Lidar Terrain Mapping.
It has been acquired by Indian National Centre for Ocean Information Services (INCOIS).
It has been acquired from National Remote Sensing Centre (NRSC).
It does Tsunami Inundation modelling and vulnerability mapping.
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change has informed about the updated Nationally Determined Contributions (NDCs) to achieve carbon neutrality. India now stands committed to reduce Emissions Intensity of its GDP by _______  by 2030, from 2005 level.
options: 50%
33% -35%
40%
45%
60%

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change informed about the commitments made under 26th UN Climate Change Conference of the Parties (COP26) held at Glasgow, UK. Which of the following commitments is/are incorrectly matched with their target year?
options: Increase non-fossil energy capacity to 500 GW                                                         -      2030
Meet 50% of energy from renewable energy                                                             -      2030
Reduce the total projected Carbon emissions by one billion tonnes                   -      2040
Reduce the carbon intensity of its economy by less than 45%                                -      2030
Achieve the target of Net Zero                                                                                       -       2070

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change has shared information about the Climate Change. India with more than 17 % of global population has contributed only about ___________ of the global cumulative greenhouse gas emissions between 1850 and 2019.
options: 11%
7%
6%
4%
3%

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the Ministry of Jal Shakti has informed about the water quality of river Ganga. As per river water quality data of 2021, _________ Ganga Stretches are in Priority Category I to IV.
options: Three
Five
Seven
Zero
Two

quiz.text: CPCB categorizes polluted water stretches in ______ different Priority Categories, where Priority Category I is ______ polluted.
options: 4; most
5; least
5; most
4; least
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the Union Minister of State for Jal Shakti has informed about the safety of Dams in written reply to a question in winter session of the Parliament. As per the National Register of Large Dams (2019 edition) compiled by the Central Water Commission, India has 227 functional large dams which are more than 100 years old (constructed in or before 1921), out of which 62 (highest) are in ___________.
options: Andhra Pradesh
Uttar Pradesh
Madhya Pradesh
Maharashtra
Tamil Nadu

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the Minister of State for Jal Shakti has informed about the orders of National Green Tribunal for the control of pollution. NGT was set up in which of the following years under National Green Tribunal Act as a statutory body?
options: 2004
2010
2008
2006
2001

quiz.text: Arth Ganga Initiative has a target to contribute at least _____ of the GDP from the Ganga basin.
options: 3%
1%
1.5%
2.5%
4%

quiz.text: Arth Ganga Initiative focuses on six verticals/areas. Which of the following vertical is incorrectly mentioned?
options: Zero Budget Natural Farming
Monetization & Reuse of Sludge & Wastewater
Livelihood Generation Opportunities
Promote the cultural heritage and tourism
Empowering states for improved water governance

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change has informed about the various measures undertaken to promote Renewable Energy (RE) in the country. Which of the following key measures is/are correctly mentioned below?
options: Permitting Foreign Direct Investment (FDI) up to 100% under the automatic route.
Declaration of trajectory for Renewable Purchase Obligation (RPO) up to year 2029-30
Setting up of Ultra Mega Renewable Energy Parks.
1 and 3
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text:
Recently (Dec 2022), the 176th Raksha Pension Samadhan Aayojan, an outreach programme for Pensioners on the SPARSH has been organised in New Delhi by Defence Accounts Department.

The Department has also signed an MoU with Six Banks for SPARSH related Services. Which of the following is not one of the six banks?
options: Axis Bank Ltd
HDFC Bank Ltd
Indian Post Payments Bank
Equitas SFB
Bandhan Bank

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the Ministry of Women and Child Development informed about the initiatives for the child safety and development. According to Juvenile Justice (Care and Protection of Children) Act, 2015, under section _______, every State Government has to constitute a District Child Protection Unit (DCPU) for every district.
options: 106
82
156
189
38

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment has shared the annual budget/target of the National Backward Classes Finance & Development Corporation (NBCFDC). What is the annual budget/target of NBCFDC in 2021-22?
options: Rs. 1172 crores
Rs. 872 crores
Rs. 672 crores
Rs. 472 crores
Rs. 1572 crores

quiz.text:
Recently (Dec 2022), the Union Minister of Rural Development and Panchayati Raj has inaugurated the new campus of the National Academy of Rural Development and Self Employment Training Institute (RUDSETI) - NAR at Kumbalagodu in Bengaluru, Karnataka. Rural Self Employment Training Institutes are sponsored by which of the following categories of banks?

A.     Public Sector Banks

B.      Private Banks

C.      Co-operative Banks

D.     Gramin Banks
options: A and B
B and D
A only
A, B and D
A, B, C and D

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the Ministry of Development of North-East Region has informed about the North Eastern Region Community Resource Management Project (NERCORMP). Phase 3 of NERCORMP was being conducted in which of the following states?
options: Manipur
Nagaland
Mizoram
Assam
Tripura

quiz.text: As per the revised definition of MSMEs, an enterprise is termed as ‘Small Enterprise’ if it has a maximum investment of _______________.
options: Rs. 5 crore
Rs. 10 crore
Rs. 25 crore
Rs. 1 crore
Rs. 50 crore

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the Minister of State for Labour & Employment has informed about the four labor codes. Under Code on Wages 2019, a worker becomes eligible for an annual bonus after working for atleast ________ in an accounting year.
options: 90 days
45 days
30 days
60 days
120 days

quiz.text:
Recently (Dec 2022), Minister of State for Labour & Employment has provided information about e-shram portal. Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to e-Shram portal?

A.     National Informatics Centre is the technology partner of the portal.

B.      Unorganized workers aged between 21 to 59 years can register on the portal.

C.      E-shram cards containing 12 digits Universal Account Number is provided.
options: A and C
B and C
A and B
A only
A, B and C

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the Minister of State for Micro Small and Medium Enterprises has briefed about the initiatives taken by the Government of India to deal with pending dues to Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises. A half yearly return must be submitted to the Ministry of Corporate Affairs quoting the due amount and the reasons of the delay, if the buyer of a MSME defaults the payment more than ________ days from the date of acceptance or the date of deemed acceptance of the goods or services,
options: 15
90
60
45
120

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), Minister of State for Labour & Employment has provided details about the National Career Service (NCS) Project. NCS portal works on which of the following pillars?
options: ICT
Model Career Centers across India
Interlinkage with all the states through employment exchanges
2 and 3
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: 1st ILR Project under National Perspective Plan (NPP) was _____________.
options: Ganga Cauvery Link
Ken Betwa Link Project
Parbati-Kalisindh-Chambal (PKC) link project
Ganga Brahmaputra Link
None of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following is/are not key mandate(s) of National Water Development Agency?
options: Studies for optimum utilization of water resources of the Peninsular and Himalayan River System.
Exploration of the feasibility of intra-states links.
Preparation of Detailed Project Report (DPR) of river link proposals under NPP.
To undertake implementation of ILR projects and completion of water resources projects under Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchai Yojana (PMKSY).
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the Union Minister of Law and Justice informed about the percentage of women elected/nominated to Lok Sabha, Rajya Sabha. What is the approximate percentage of women MPs in Lok Sabha as informed by the minister?
options: 21%
26%
17%
9%
15%

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the Minister of State for Education informed about the initiatives for female in higher education in Rajya Sabha. All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) is also giving 10000 scholarships (PRAGATI) of the amount of ____________ per annum for every year of study, to the girls entering in the technical education.
options: Rs 10,000
Rs 75,000
Rs 50,000
Rs 25,000
Rs 1,00,000

quiz.text:
Recently (Dec 2022), Union Minister of State for Personnel, Public Grievances & Pensions has informed that about 696 issues pertaining to big ticket projects have been resolved through the PRAGATI and Project Monitoring Group (PMG) in last two years. Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to PRAGATI platform?

A.     It was launched in 2015.

B.      Its aim is to monitor and review important programmes and projects of the Central government only.

C.      It has a three-tier system with PMO at the top.
options: A and B
B only
A only
A and C
A, B and C

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the National Centre for Good Governance (NCGG) has organized capacity building programs for civil servants of Maldives and Bangladesh at Mussoorie, Uttarakhand. So far, NCGG has imparted training to civil servants of how many countries?
options: 15
21
18
12
7

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the Central Board of Indirect Taxes and Customs (CBIC) has celebrated the completion of _______ years of the enactment of the Customs Act.
options: 50
60
75
40
55

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the Department of Commerce (DOC), Ministry of Commerce and Industry amended the SEZ (Special Economic Zone) rules to liberalize Work From Home (WFH) for all SEZ units. WFH can be provided to upto __________ of all employees of the SEZ unit.
options: 75%
50%
80%
100%
60%

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the first meeting of the Development Working Group (DWG) of G20 under India’s G20 Presidency has been held in Mumbai, Maharashtra. The session on ‘Data for Development (D4D): Role of G20 in advancing the 2030 Agenda’ was organized by which of the following organizations?
options: Government of India
Observer Research Foundation (ORF)
United Nations Conference on Trade and Development
1 and 2
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: Development Working Group (DWG) of G20 is one of the _________ Working Groups under the G20 Sherpa Track.
options: 11
13
9
15
7

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the 9th Meeting of Ministers of Justice of the Shanghai Cooperation Organization (SCO) Member States has been represented by Union Minister of Law & Justice, Government of India. SCO member countries contribute about _________ of global GDP.
options: 22%
46%
30%
39%
27%

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the Union Minister of Ports, Shipping and Waterways has informed about the initiatives taken to promote inland water transport in the country.  Waterway usage charges levied by the IWAI (Inland waterways Authority of India) on vessels moving on National Waterways have been waived in July 2020, initially for a period of ____________.
options: three years
five years
two years
seven years
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the Ministry of Defence informed about the two Defence Industrial Corridors (DICs) in the country. The DICs are located in which of the following states?
options: Uttar Pradesh
Karnataka
Maharashtra
1 and 2
1 and 3

quiz.text: India Post Payments Bank was launched as pilot project in 2017 in which of the following states?
options: Chhattisgarh
Jharkhand
Odisha
1 and 2
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), the Ministry of Finance informed that NIIF-managed funds have invested in 16 entities covering ports and logistics, renewable energy, roads, digital infrastructure, healthcare, manufacturing, etc. The Governing Council of NIIF is chaired by which of the following?
options: PM of India
Union Finance Minister
Union Commerce & Industry Minister
Finance Secretary
CEO of NITI Aayog

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), which of the following states/UTs has received the award for Best Practice in ACSM in Tuberculosis control?
options: Jammu & Kashmir
Meghalaya
Delhi
Bihar
Odisha

quiz.text:
Recently (Dec 2022), which of the following groups/organizations has established an

International Climate Club to fight global warming?
options: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development
G20
International Energy Agency
G7
International Union for Conservation of Nature
